SKT_FIRST.name: Frigid Hail Fire
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nThis skill deals more damage the higher your <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> is.\nIf the target has the Fire attribute, decreases their Priority by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵を攻撃します。\n自身の<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>が高いほどダメージが増加します。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>火属性</color>の場合、行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>-10%</color>減少させます。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.\n대상이 화속성이라면 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>-10%</color> 감소시킵니다
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,造成的伤害越高。\n目标为<color=#28d9ed>火属性</color>时,降低其行动值<color=#28d9ed>-10%</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Ice Chunk
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\nこのスキルは、自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color> 상태로 만듭니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>冰冻</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Frostblow
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Priority by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.\nThis skill deals more damage the higher your <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> is.\nIf the targets have the Fire attribute, decreases their Priority by an additional <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体を攻撃し、行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>-15%</color>減少させます。\nこのスキルは自身の<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>が高いほどダメージが増加します。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>火属性</color>の場合、さらに<color=#28d9ed>-10%</color>分行動ゲージを減少させます。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 대상의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>-15%</color> 감소시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.\n대상이 화속성이라면 행동 게이지를 추가로 <color=#28d9ed>-10%</color> 감소시킵니다
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并降低其行动值<color=#28d9ed>-15%</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,造成的伤害越高。\n目标为<color=#28d9ed>火属性</color>时,追加降低行动值<color=#28d9ed>-10%</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、CPを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>回復する。\n\n<color=#fff95f>連携効果</color>:自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,使CP恢复<color=#28d9ed>25</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>越高,则伤害量越高。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
